meanings.definition: To discharge waste matter from the body through the anus.
meanings.sent1: Dogs defecate outside to keep their living area clean.
meanings.sent2: It is important to defecate regularly for good health.
meanings.sent3: The bird seemed to defecate on the car just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The factory seemed to defecate pollution into the air without care.
meanings.sent5: The image of the overflowing trash can defecating garbage was disturbing.

meanings.sent1: After breakfast, he felt the urge to defecate.
meanings.sent2: It is normal for babies to defecate multiple times a day.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to defecate in the litter box right after it was cleaned.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river seemed to defecate water downstream.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbage truck made her think of defecating waste.
